description: Whether you are constantly on the go, working out at the gym, or just plain hate wires, this HDE Bluetooth headset is perfect for you.  All it takes is a few hours of charging, and you have a full day of crisp music and phone calls.Features:* Hi-Fi Bluetooth sound experience will enhance any game, music, movie or phone call.* Built in noise cancelling microphone lets you answer any phone call on the go when paired to your mobile phone* This headset works with any Bluetooth enabled device.  Including iPhone, iPad, virtually all android tablets and cell phones, televisions, and many more gadgets!* On ear controls include:* Power On/Off* Play/Pause* Next/Previous* Volume* Answer/End Call* Reject a Call* Redial* Active Voice Dialing* Switch CallSpecifications:- Compatible with Bluetooth version 1.2 or higher- 10 hours of music playback time- 12 hours of talk time- Operating range of 10 meters- Fully charged in 3.5 hours- 200 hours of standby time- Rechargeable 450mAh Lithium Ion battery- Frequency range: 2.4026GHz - 2.4800GHz
title: HDE® SX-907 Bluetooth Stereo Headphones
